settings.title: IFTTT Settings
settings.webhook_intro:
For IFTTT to work with Homey, you have to register a webhook first. Copy and paste the Webhook URL, ID and Secret into the fields below. You can use the Webhook URL in your IFTTT recipes to trigger events on Homey!

Make sure that all your recipes that will trigger a flow on Homey have a json encoded body with the following properties: {"event":"your_event_name_here"}
settings.ifttt_intro: Besides that, fill in your IFTTT key below. If you don't have a key yet, please register your IFTTT Maker Channel.
